Welcome to the Jensen Lab

Our team of engineers and scientists tackle infectious diseases. We use robotics, genomics, and computation to accelerate microbiology and design new therapies.


Deep Phenotyping Status

Our Deep Phenotyping system has completed 929,502 automated experiments since January 2020.

News

In August 2022 our lab will move to a new home in the Department of Biomedical Engineering at the University of Michigan!
